attributes.title: This app is cursed
attributes.review: I got this app to see what our FANTASTIC President maybe up to but since I got it all I get is notifiers constantly. And of course now everything is cursed, my entire house shakes and moans with the voices of the damned, those who dared to work under his administration, they cry to me each night begging for the nightmare to end. So I tried to contact them, although an ouiji board wasnâ€™t my best idea, because now I have a demon named Itirim in the corner of my room wants his roommates gone but canâ€™t get rid of them either and itâ€™s all because of this app, Itirim is getting all cranky over this so heâ€™s not even the mood to reap my soul. I mean what kind of demon isnâ€™t in the mood to steal a soul, this app has even messed up demons, how is that even possible?

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading this app all apps on my phone got deleted except for this app. I had to go to the store to fix it and it cost me $1,000!!!! Turns out it also started hacking all of my accounts and deleting all data. If you want this app, donâ€™t get it. It completely messed up my phone and all my social media accounts, including Facebook and Twitter!!!! Also, after they fixed my phone, the app started glitching out and told me to do weird things and go to weird places in the middle of the night will also making alarms go off at 1:35 am every morning to tell me to go somewhere and do something. It was really creepy and I couldnâ€™t delete the app until I got a new phone with a new apple id.

attributes.title: TRUMP KILLED BARRY THE BEEğŸ˜©ğŸ˜”ğŸ¤­ğŸ¥ºğŸ˜¤
attributes.review:
According to all known laws

of aviation,

  

there is no way a bee

should be able to fly.

  

Its wings are too small to get

its fat little body off the ground.

  

The bee, of course, flies anyway

  

because bees don't care

what humans think is impossible.

  

Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

Yellow, black. Yellow, black.

  

Ooh, black and yellow!

Let's shake it up a little.

  

Barry! Breakfast is ready!

  

Ooming!

  

Hang on a second.

  

Hello?

  

- Barry?

- Adam?

  

- Oan you believe this is happening?

- I can't. I'll pick you up.

  

Looking sharp.

  

Use the stairs. Your father

paid good money for those.

  

Sorry. I'm excited.

  

Here's the graduate.

We're very proud of you, son.

  

A perfect report card, all B's.

  

Very proud.

  

Ma! I got a thing going here.

  

- You got lint on your fuzz.

- Ow! That's me!

  

- Wave to us! We'll be in row 118,000.

- Bye!

  

Barry, I told you,

stop flying in the house!

  

- Hey, Adam.

- Hey, Barry.

  

- Is that fuzz gel?

- A little. Special day, graduation.

  

Never thought I'd make it.

  

Three days grade school,

three days high school.

  

Those were awkward.

Iâ€™m too lazy to paste the whole script

attributes.title: I canâ€™t believe my eyes
attributes.review: I got the app to support the Cheeto man but then whenever I open the app it was horrendous. It was the worst thing Iâ€™ve ever seen. As soon as I saw the manâ€™s face my stomach started twisting and I almost puked everywhere. now that is not something that people should have to go through. He gave me chills and Iâ€™m pretty sure that I will have nightmares because of it. That is not even the worst part. I showed my dog and she ran in fear, her tail in between her legs and she was staring at me with a scared look on her face. This app is not only scaring little kids but itâ€™s also scaring the adults and even pets. Plus the app started glitching and it was almost like I was getting hacked. This app is not safe for the App Store and should be deleted immediately.

attributes.title: The most offensive person Iâ€™ve never known besides Kaitlin Bennet
attributes.review: Literally the mention of either name makes my insides turn like I just chugged a double jumbo margarita and ate 74 and a half sweet chili Doritos. My head spins as I try to comprehend the logic that passes through their head and I have to keep a barf bag near by at all times Incase I encounter a supporter. I feel as if I physically need to go get vaccinated when seeing that a president needs to try so hard to be loved and re-elected that he has to make a whole app. Like his word vomit on every other platform isnâ€™t enough to stop him from trying to assault everyoneâ€™s intellectual status by believing that they will download this app for any other reason than to soil any type of positive word said about him.
